name: Merge Pets
description:
Merge Pets and Race them to earn Money. Win the race!

Combine pets to create new animals.

Collect a house full of fuzzy fun pets.
Collect all 30 pets!

Idle, you earn money while you sleep

Free spins for rewards!

Unlock powerups as you progress.

Play Dog, Cat, Mouse, Cow, Horse, Chicken, Monkey ,Tiger, panda and many more!
